titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3132) to make improvements to the national sex offender registration program, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3132) to make improvements to the national sex offender registration program, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-219, by Mr. Gingrey.

No amendment to the committee amendment in the nature of a substitute shall be in order except those printed in the portion of the Congressional Record designated for the purpose in clause 8 of rule XVIII and except pro forma amendments for the purpose of debate.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 83.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 436.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3132) to make improvements to the national sex offender registration program.
